inclusion.criterion: Pre- or post-menopausal women with stage II - III breast cancer (AJCC 2002)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biopsy-proven invasive breast cancer, excised with negative margins of at least 1 mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Status post segmental mastectomy or mastectomy and axillary node dissection with removal of at least 8 nodes
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: One to 5 involved lymph nodes identified at axillary staging
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 2 weeks from last chemotherapy or before chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No more than sixty days from final surgery to simulation if no systemic therapy (includes chemotherapy and Hormonal therapy) is given
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient needs to be able to understand and demonstrate willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous radiation therapy to the ipsilateral breast
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than 5 involved nodes identified at axillary staging
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current treatment for active connective tissue disorders, such as lupus or scleroderma
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. She is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
